name: pnp-list-formatting-sticky-notes-board
title: Sticky Notes Board
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to display sticky notes in a Board View.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to display sticky notes in a Board View.

metadata.value: Icons, Inline Editing, Hover Cards, Board

ms-bgColor-white, ms-fontColor-neutralPrimary--hover, ms-fontColor-neutralSecondary, ms-fontColor-neutralSecondaryAlt, ms-fontColor-neutralQuaternary, sp-css-backgroundColor-BgCoral30, sp-css-backgroundColor-BgGold60, sp-css-backgroundColor-BgMintGreen30, sp-css-backgroundColor-BgLightPurple30

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
